data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, In Chester Philadelphia attack through Andrew Wooten. The finish is off target, however.
New England have a goal kick.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Philadelphia throw-in in New England's half.
In the minute 3, Guido Gonzales Jr awards the away team a throw-in.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
In the minute 5, Free kick for New England in the half of Philadelphia.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of New England.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for New England in their own half.
Matt Polster (New England) has received a yellow card from Guido Gonzales Jr.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
Goal kick for New England at Subaru Park.
In the minute 11, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a New England throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in New England.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in New England.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Jose Martinez is booked for the home team.
In the minute 21, New England are caught offside.
Alejandro Bedoya gets his shot on target but fails to score for Philadelphia.
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kacper Przybylko for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards the home team a throw-in.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
In the minute 30, Jose Martinez (Philadelphia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Jakob Glesnes (Philadelphia) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the away team in Chester.
Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of New England.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Philadelphia close to the penalty box.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
In the minute 36, Free kick for New England in their own half.
Raymon Gaddis for Philadelphia has been booked by Guido Gonzales Jr and receives a first yellow card.
Brendan Aaronson (Philadelphia) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Brendan Aaronson (Philadelphia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
New England drive upfield and Adam Buksa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Philadelphia defender.
In the minute 41, New England's Kelyn Rowe misses with an attempt on goal.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Guido Gonzales Jr waits before resuming play because Jose Martinez for Philadelphia is still down.
In the minute 44, New England's Adam Buksa breaks free at Subaru Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
Jose Martinez is back on his feet again.
In the minute 45, New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in New England territory.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for New England at Subaru Park.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Subaru Park.
The second-half has started.
New England have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 47, New England attack but Teal Bunbury's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
In the minute 48, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Philadelphia throw-in in New England's half.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
In the minute 50, Alejandro Bedoya (Philadelphia) gets a yellow card.
Philadelphia drives forward and Brendan Aaronson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
In the minute 52, New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
Philadelphia's Jose Martinez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 53, New England have a goal kick.
Throw-in for New England in the half of Philadelphia.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Free kick New England.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for New England in Chester.
In the minute 56, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for New England, close to Philadelphia's area.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Matt Polster (New England) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Alejandro Bedoya for Philadelphia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
In the minute 59, Scott Caldwell is replacing Adam Buksa for New England at Subaru Park.
New England will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Philadelphia.
New England to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
In the minute 62, Can Philadelphia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New England's half?
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for New England at Subaru Park.
The home team replace Olivier Mbaizo with Matt Real.
Important block from the New England defence as Anthony Fontana fires in a strike for Philadelphia.
Anthony Fontana is on a sub for Andrew Wooten for Philadelphia.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
In the minute 66, Anthony Fontana (Philadelphia) has received a first yellow card.
Attention is being given to New England’s Tommy McNamara and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 67, Tommy McNamara, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Tajon Buchanan is the substitute for New England.
Bruce Arena is making the team's third substitution at Subaru Park with Diego Fagundez replacing Cristian Penilla.
Philadelphia needs to be cautious. New England have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to New England.
Throw-in for New England in the half of Philadelphia.
New England have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 71, Philadelphia needs to be cautious. New England have an attacking throw-in.
New England have a dangerous throw-in.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Philadelphia throw-in in New England's half.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
In the minute 73, Goal! Philadelphia have got their heads in front thanks to a Anthony Fontana strike.
Kacper Przybylko with an assist there.
In the minute 75, Free kick New England.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
The away team have replaced Teal Bunbury with Gustavo Bou. This is the fourth substitution made today by Bruce Arena.
In the minute 76, Bruce Arena (New England) is making a fifth substitution, with Lee Nguyen replacing Kelyn Rowe.
Throw-in high up the field for Philadelphia in Chester.
New England's Lee Nguyen is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, New England have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Tajon Buchanan levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 81, Gustavo Bou instrumental with a fine assist.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In Chester, Jose Martinez of Philadelphia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 84, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Henry Kessler.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Henry Kessler for New England is back on the field again.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to New England.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
Guido Gonzales Jr will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for New England in the half of Philadelphia.
In Chester New England attack through Gustavo Bou. The finish is off target, however.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia pushes forward through Anthony Fontana, whose finish on goal is saved.
That's full-time at Subaru Park. The final score is 2-1.
Mark McKenzie (Philadelphia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jim Curtin (Philadelphia) is making a third substitution, with Jack de Vries replacing Jose Martinez.
Anthony Fontana is on target to give Philadelphia a 2-1 advantage.
